item.description:
There are lots of processes to help you feel better when you're not feeling good. One of them is EFT, the Emotional Freedom Technique.

With EFT you tap on energy meridian points on your body, and make releasing statements as you do so. Mark has found a way to use EFT to move out of an issue of resistance/feeling "bad" into a perfect state of allowing -connecting to Joy, Laughter, Praise, Beauty, Love, Inspiration, Well-Being and Freedom. These align with "Abraham's" version of a 10 commandments. They don't call them commandments. Instead they call them verbal offerings of that which they have found to be a very good way of life.

We'll share these "offerings" with you, and teach you the EFT process; so you can leave with a new method for feeling really, really, really good! Of course, we'll actually practice it during the meeting.

Please be considerate to only rsvp "yes" if you know you are really planning on attending, and also let us know if your plans change.

Feel free to come early to have extra time for chatting; and we're happy to hang out afterward, as well.

Looking forward to playing and learning together!

Ann and Mark
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be upstairs. Go to back of front lobby for stairway.

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: April Meetup - Emotional Freedom and the Law of Attraction
